item.title: My First Post
item.description: hello world #include <iostream> #include <iterator> #include <string> using namespace std; int main(int argc, char ** argv) { //char str[] = "hello"; //char * s = str; //char ** c = &s; //std::cout << c << " " << *c << " " << s << std::endl; string str = "hello world"; string::iterator it = str.begin(); *it = 'G'; std::cout << str << std::endl; } Welcome to Leanote! 欢迎来到Leanote!
